text: Pietro Umberto Acciarito (1871 - 1943) was an Italian anarchist. Born in france, he lived near Rome. Acciarito is famous because he tried to kill the Italian king, Umberto I, on 22 April 1897, for which he was sent to prison for life.Acciarito Pietro (1871-1943), ==Related pages== * List of anarchists ==References== ==Other websites== * drawing of the attack Category:Italian anarchists Category:1871 births Category:1943 deaths
title: Pietro Acciarito
